/data/queryHistoryCommandList:
SELECT A.ROW_ID,A.INS_CODE,A.INS_TYPE,A.PAYLOAD,A.CNT_EXECUTE,A.CNT_OFFLINE,A.CNT_ING,A.CNT_SUCCESS,
A.CNT_FAIL,A.EXTRA_INFO,A.ACTIVE_FLAG,A.CREATE_BY,A.CREATE_DATE,A.UPDATE_BY,A.UPDATE_DATE,B.AD_NAME 
FROM AD_ODS_INSTRUCT A 
LEFT JOIN AD_ODS_ADVERT B ON A.EXTRA_INFO=B.AD_CODE AND B.ACTIVE_FLAG=1 
WHERE A.ACTIVE_FLAG=1 
AND A.INS_CODE >= 181213010
/data/queryCommandDetailList:
SELECT * FROM AD_ODS_INS_DETAIL T WHERE ACTIVE_FLAG=1 
AND T.COMP_DATE  BETWEEN STR_TO_DATE(@startTime,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') 
AND STR_TO_DATE(@endTime,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') 
ORDER BY T.ROW_ID LIMIT @startPos,@endPos
/data/queryElectricFenceList: SELECT * FROM AD_ODS_ELE_FENCE T WHERE T.ACTIVE_FLAG = 1
/data/queryDeviceList:
SELECT ROW_ID,GROUP_CODE,DTU_CODE,DEV_CODE,DEV_NAME,DEV_STATUS,REMARK,ACTIVE_FLAG,CREATE_BY, 
CREATE_DATE,UPDATE_BY,UPDATE_DATE,GROUP_NAME,ONLINE,LAST_CONTACT 
FROM AD_ODS_DEVICE_VIEW WHERE ACTIVE_FLAG=1 
ORDER BY ROW_ID DESC LIMIT @startPos,@endPos
/data/queryDeviceAdvertList:
SELECT ROW_ID,DTU_CODE,AD_CODE,IS_SUCCESS,ACTIVE_FLAG,CREATE_BY,CREATE_DATE,UPDATE_BY,UPDATE_DATE,
AD_ROW_ID,AD_NAME,AD_TYPE,CUST_CODE,BEGIN_DATE,END_DATE,AD_STATUS 
FROM AD_ODS_DEVICE_ADVERT_VIEW WHERE ACTIVE_FLAG=1 
AND CREATE_DATE BETWEEN STR_TO_DATE(@startTime,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') 
AND STR_TO_DATE(@endTime,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') 
ORDER BY ROW_ID DESC LIMIT @startPos,@endPos
/data/queryPlayTimeList: select * from AD_ODS_AD_PLAYTIME t where t.ACTIVE_FLAG=1 order by ROW_ID LIMIT @startPos,@endPos
/data/queryTimeDateList: select * from AD_ODS_AD_TIME_DATE t where t.ACTIVE_FLAG=1 order by ROW_ID LIMIT @startPos,@endPos
